subject: Re: Some interesting things caught using FB's # 80
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I don't like that ghost hunter crap, it's all focused on the negative, fear, demons and darkness, that's why I stay away from the group, the focius is mostly ghost hunting BS.

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Rick Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@...> wrote:
>
> 1st of all I miss frank,thank god he's my neighbor.I have a Paranormal group 
> www.realinvestigationsoftheparanormal.net and we often bring #80 with us on our 
> investigations.take a listen to some things we caught when we did a case last 
> week where a women has been getting strangled to where she couldn't breath..I 
> have 40 EVPs and prox.45 recordings off FB # 80 using 1 of our digital 
> recorders..Take a good listen,to verify what we're gettingb is REAL,I'll ask who 
> made this box and Always get "Frank"..Take a look at our site to hear and see 
> what we got from "The Melting Pot"....Amazing....
>
